summary: The crew of a five-man submarine travels the world oceans, planting sensors on the ocean floor to warn scientists of any impending earthquakes.
cast: Lloyd Bridges|Brian Kelly|Shirley Eaton|David McCallum|Keenan Wynn|Marshall Thompson|Gary Merrill|Ron Hayes|George Shibata|Donald Linton|Frank Logan|Don Wells|Jack Ewalt|George De Vries|Tony Gulliver|Joey Carter|Celeste Yarnall|Paul Gray
title: La vuelta al mundo bajo el mar
